tgt_text: Imiba enguNdaba-mlonyeni.

src_text: Eneji.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Kabinete etse hloko tswelopele entsweng ka ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Tshebetso ya Eneji, ha ntse amohela hore ho na le ditshitiso tse ntseng di le teng kgahlanong le marangrang naha..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwuncomile umsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokuqaliswa ukusetyenziswa kwesiCwangciso sokuSebenza soMbane, nangona ivumile ukuba iziko lombane lesizwe liseneengxakana elijongene nazo.

src_text: Ha naha kena nakong ya Mariha, Kabinete amohetse phethelo ya Konteraka bakeng sa di-megawatts tse 400 (MW) tsa bokgoni bo ekeditsweng ka Standard Offer Programme tla ba inthaneteng pele ho mafelo Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Njengokuba singena kwixesha laseBusika kweli lizwe, iKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuqukunjelwa kwesiVumelwano sombane ozimegawathi (i-MW) ezingama-400 eziza kongezwa kulo sinawo ovela kwinkqubo ebizwa i-Standard Offer Programme oza kugalelwa kulo wesizwe phambi kokuphela kukaCanzibe wowama-..
Ukongeza, iSebe lezeMpilo likhethe izibhedlela ezingama-213 ezingazikuchatshazelwa ngucimi-cimi wombane.

src_text: Ho feta moo, Lefapha la Bophelo bo botle le kgethile dipetlele tse 213 hore di se angwe ke ho kgaoha ha motlakase, ho tsona tse 76 di se di ntse di qheletswe ka thoko mme lefapha le sebeletsa hore le eketse dipetlele tse ding tse 46 ha boemo bo se bo hatetse pele..
tgt_text: Kwezi zibhedlela, ezingama-76 sele zixhamla kule nkqubo yokungachatshazelwa ngucimi-cimi wombane, kwaye sele equkunjelwa amalungiselela ezinye ezingama-46 okuzikhusela kule ngxaki kacimi-cimi wombane.

src_text: Kabinete amohela hape ho thakgolwa ho atametseng ha Energy One-Stop Shop ka la 31 Motsheanong 2023 ke Invest SA ho potlakisa mekgwa ya taolo tla thusa dikhampani tse ntjha tse fehlang matla hore le tsona di nke karolo etse hloko tswelopele entsweng Seteisheneng se Fehlang Matla sa Kusile ho tsosolosa 3 200 MW, yuniting ya 1, 2, 3 le ya 5, ho marangrang naha qetellong ya..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yawamkela nalo msebenzi uzayo wokusekwa kweZiko lezaMandla elinguNtozonke ngomhla wama-31 kuCanzibe 2023 yi-Invest SA ngeenjongo zokukhawulezisa iinkqubo zokuqulunqa imithetho eza kwenza ukuba kube lula kwiinkampani ezintsha ezivelisa umbane ukuba ziqalise umsebenzi wazo wokuvelisa umbane..

src_text: Kabinete tshwenyehile ka tswelopele ya phatlalatso ya ditaba tsa bohata, ho pharalla le metjha ya ditaba ya setjhaba bolelang ka katamelo ya ho putlama ha marangrang naha leng se tla baka ho tima ha motlakase ka ho felletseng.
tgt_text: Ivile nangomsebenzi osele wenziwe kwiZiko loPhehlo-mbane laseKusile sokuba iphinde ivelise umbane ongama-3 200 MW isebenzisa i-unithi 1, 2, 3 no-5 oza kugalelwa kulo wesizwe phambi kokuba lo nyaka wama-2023 uphele.

src_text: Eskom tiiseditse mmuso ka merero keneng tshebetsong bakeng sa ditshireletso tsa tsamaiso ho thibela ho tima ha motlakase ka ho felletseng naheng yohle.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixhalabile zindaba ezibubuvuvu ezisasazwa ngabantu besebenzisa amakhasi onxibelelwano ezityhola ngokuba iziko lombane leli liza kuwa into leyo eza kubangela ukuba isizwe sonke sibe sebumnyameni.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa hape ho batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa hore ba tswele pele ho boloka motlakase.
tgt_text: U-Eskom umxelele urhulumente ukuba unazo izicwangciso zokulalelisela xa kunokwenzeka ukuba umbane ucime pam kwizwelonke.

src_text: Morero ke ho boloka bonyane 1 000 MW ka letsatsi leng se lekanang le ho boloka mohato wa pele wa ho kgaoha ha motlakase letsatsi ka leng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyaqhuba nekhwelo eyayilihlabile lokuba bonke abantu abaseMzantsi Afrika mabonge umbane.

src_text: Letona la Motlakase, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa tla tsebisa naha ka dintlha tsa moraorao tsa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Tshebetso ya Eneji ka Labohlano la 26 Motsheanong 2023, puisanong ya boraditaba.
tgt_text: Iinjongo zethu kukuba sikwazi ukonga umbane oli-1 000 MW yonke imihla, umyinge lowo ulingana nenqanaba elinye lokucinywa kombane ngosuku ngalinye.

src_text: Bophelo bo Botle.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezoMbane, uGq Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, uza kunika ingxelo ngeza kutsha nje malunga nokuqaliswa ukusetyenziswa kwesiCwangciso sokuSebenza sezaMandla ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2023, kwintlanganiso aza kube eyibambe noonondaba.

src_text: Mmuso thehile komiti sebetsang ya setekgeniki etellwang pele ke Lefapha la Naha la Bophelo bo Botle, ho arabela seweng sa kholera Hammanskraal Toropong ya Tshwane seng bolaile batho ba 15 ho tloha ka la 24 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: Ezempilo.

src_text: Ho etswa mosebetsi moholo wa ho lekola mehlodi yohle ka bang teng ya tshilafalo bang ke mehlodi ya metsi, ditanka tse tsamaisang metsi, dipompo le Tshebetso ya ho Hlwekisa Metsi Ditshila ya Rooiwal (WWTW).
tgt_text: Urhulumente useke ikomiti yeengcali, ekhokelwa liSebe lezeMpilo likaZwelonke, eza kujongana nale ngxaki yokuqhambuka kwesifo sotyatyazo e-Hammanskraal kwisiXeko sase-Tshwane, apho sele kusweleke abantu abali-15 ngokweengxelo zomhla wama-24 kuCanzibe..

src_text: Ho fihlela jwale, ha ho na bopaki ba ho fumanwa ha baktheria ya kholera mehloding ena leng se re kgodisang hore ho ka etsahala ebe kholera bile ketsahalo ya nako le nngwe feela ya tshilafalo, ka ditshwaetso tsa hajwale tseo ka nna ya ba di bakilwe ke ba tshwaeditsweng mme le bona ba tshwaetsa ba bang.
tgt_text: Sithetha nje uyaqhuba umsebenzi omkhulu wokuzingela izinto ezinokuba zizo ezingcolise amanzi, ukusuka emanzini la uqobo, ukuya kwiiloli ezithutha amanzi, iimpompo zamanzi kunye ne-Rooiwal Wastewater Treatment Works (i-WWTW).

src_text: Ha mesebetsi ena ntse tswela pele, baahi ba Hammanskraal ba kgothaletswa hore ba bedise metsi pompo mme ba tshele letswai le seng le kae pele ba nwa.
tgt_text: Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, akukabikho bungqina bukhomba ukuba intsholongwane yesifo sotyatyazo ifumaneka kwezi zinto zikhankanyiweyo, into leyo ke efuna ukuhambelana nalo mbono uthi kungenzeka ukuba olu qhambuka lubangelwe yile ntsholongwane ethe yangena ngebhaqo emanzini, baze ke aba bantu banaso ngoku babe bosulelwe ngabanye abantu okanye bosulelwe ngabo nabo bosulelweyo.

src_text: Ho phaella moo, mang kapa mang ya nang le letshollo, ho nyekelwa ke pelo kapa matshwao tshebetso ya mala lokela ho potlakela ngakeng kapa tleliniking ya lehae.
tgt_text: Njengoko la malinge okungenelela eqhuba, abahlali base-Hammanskrral bayacelwa ukuba bawabilise amanzi aphume empompeni baze bawathi chatha intwana yetyuwa phambi kokuba bawasele.

src_text: Letona la Metsi le Bohlweki, Monghadi Senzo Mchunu tla kopana le Ramotse wa Toropo ya Tshwane, Mokhanselara Cilliers Brink, ka Labohlano la 26 Motsheanong 2023 boitekong ba ho theha moralo kopanetsweng wa ntjhafatso seng siilwe ke nako ya Rooiwal WWTW..
tgt_text: Ukongeza, nabani na osesisu esihambisayo, onesicaphu-caphu okanye olunywa sisisu kufuneka aye kwagqirha okanye kwiklinikhi ekufutshane ngokukhawuleza.

src_text: Bakeng sa dintlha tse ding ka letsetsa mohala wa mahala sebetsang bosiu le motsheare wa Setsi sa Naha sa Mafu Tshwaetsanang (NICD) ho 082 883.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezaManzi noGutyulo, uMnu Senzo Mchunu, uza kubamba intlanganiso noSodolophu wesiXeko sase-Tshwane, uCeba u-Cilliers Brink, ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2023 apho baza kupheka isicwangciso bobabini esiza kwenza umsebenzi ofanele ukuba wenziwe kudala wokulungiswa kwe-Rooiwal WWTW.

src_text: Tataiso ya phekolo ya Kholera inthaneteng ho www.nicd.ac.za.
tgt_text: Xa ufuna iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe, tsalela umnxemba iZiko leSizwe leziFo ezoSulelayo (i-NICD) elisebenza imini nobusuku kule nombolo: 082 883.

src_text: Patlisiso ya Kotara ya Basebetsi (QLFS).
tgt_text: Iindlela zokunyanga isifo sotyatyazo ziyafumena ku-intanethi apha: www.nicd.ac.za.

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse hore QLFS ya pele ya 2023 bontshitse keketseho ya botshelela ya kotara ka tatellano ho dipalo tsa mesebetsi le khiro ya batho ba dimilione tse.
tgt_text: UPhando lweKota lwezeMisebenzi (i-QLFS).

src_text: 2 haufi haholo le ho fihla khiro ha batho ba dimilione tse.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba i-QLFS yokuqala yowama-2023 ibonakalise ukuba inani lemisebenzi linyuke iikota ezintandathu zilandelana futhi nelabantu abaqeshiweyo abazizigidi ezili-.

src_text: 4 pele ho matsatsi Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: 2 linyuke lasondela kwela nani lezizigidi ezili-.

src_text: Sena ke pontsho hlakileng ya hore moruo wa Afrika Borwa ntlafala ka matla ka mora ho angwa ke sewa sena..
Kotara ya pele ya dipalopalo tsa khiro di bontsha hore ke mesebetsi 209 000 thehilweng tlasa taolo ya mmuso mme 107 000 seng tlasa taolo ya mmuso nakong ya kotara ya pele ya selemo.
tgt_text: zabantu ababephangela phambi kokufika kukabhubhane weNtsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le United States (US).
tgt_text: Oku kubonisa ngokuphandle ukuba uqoqosho loMzantsi Afrika luyahluma kwakhona emva kokuba luthwaxwe ngula bhubhane.

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse hore dikamano tse pakeng tsa Afrika Borwa le US ntse le tsa setswalle, tse matla mme di molemo bakeng sa dinaha ka bobedi ho latela seboka se neng se le dipakeng tsa Letona la Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisano, Ngaka Naledi Pandor le Lenqosa la US Afrika Borwa, Monghadi Reuben Brigety, ya boletseng hore Afrika Borwa fana ka dibetsa ho Russia.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha-mani zibonakalisa ukuba kudalwe imisebenzi engama-209 000 ngekota yokuqala kwicandelo lemisebenzi ebhaliswe ngokusesikweni yaze yangama-107 000 edalwe kwicandelo lemisebenzi engabhaliswanga ngokusesikweni kwikota yokuqala yalo nyaka.

src_text: Kabinete boletse hape hore metjha ya bodiplomate thehilweng fumaneha dinaheng tsohle, ho kenyeletsa US, ho phahamisa ditaba tse ka hlahang taolong ya dikamano tsa dinaha tse pedi.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-United States (i-US).

src_text: Kabinete amohela phatlalatso ya Cyril Ramaphosa ya ho thehwa ha patlisiso ikemetseng ho hlahloba diqoso tsa phano ya dibetsa tsa Afrika Borwa ho Russia.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikubethelele ukuba ubudlelwane phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-US busebuhle, bungqingqwa futhi bululutho kuwo omabini la mazwe emva kwentlanganiso ibiphakathi koMphathiswa wezoBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano, uGq Naledi Pandor kunye noNozaku-zaku wase-US eMzantsi Afrika, uMnu Reuben Brigety, emalunga nezityholo azenzileyo zokuba uMzantsi Afrika uthengisela i-Russia izixhobo.

src_text: Dintlha tsa patlisiso di tla phatlalatswa ka nako loketseng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikubethelela ukuba amaqonga afanelekileyo asetyenziswa ngoonozaku-zaku avuleleke kuwo onke amazwe, kuquka ne-US, ukuba avakalise izinto angaziqondiyo eziza kuchaphazela ubudlelwane phakathi kwamazwe.

src_text: Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Singapore.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isibhengezo esenziwe nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa sokuseka ikhomishoni yophando ezimeleyo ize iphande ezi zityholo zokuthengiselwa kwezixhobo kwe-Russia nguMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile amohela Tonakgolo Lee Hsien Loong wa Rephabliki ya Singapore ka Labobedi la 16 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha zale khomishoni yophando ziza kubhengezwa kungentsuku zatywala.

src_text: Singapore ke motsetedi ya bohlokwa Afrika Borwa, ka letsete la dibilione tse fetang tse hlano tsa diranta ka kakaretso lefapheng le kang la tlhahiso, ditshebeletso tsa ditjhelete le thekiso ya matlo.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika ne-Singapore.

src_text: Ditumellano tse saennweng dipakeng tsa dinaha tsena tse pedi di reretswe ho matlafatsa kgwebo, letsete, thuto le tshebedisano ya tshireletso..
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa ebendwendwelwe yiNkulumbuso u-Lee Hsien Loong weRiphabhlikhi yase-Singapore ngoLwesibini, umhla we-16 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mohlala wa Ntlafatso ya Setereke (DDM) sa Kapa Bophirimela.
Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile isa DDM ya botshelela ya Imbizo ya Mopresidente Kapa Bophirimela, Masepaleng wa Lehae wa Drakenstein, Seterekeng sa Cape Winelands, ka Labohlano la 19 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: I-Singapore ityale imali eninzi apha eMzantsi Afrika, kangangokuba ingaphezulu kweebhiliyoni ezi-R5 iimali etyalwe leliya lizwe kumacandelo afana nelemizi-mveliso, iinkonzo zezimali kunye nezokuthengiselwana komhlaba nezindlu.

src_text: Mopresidente ile etella pele moifo tswang mafapheng ohle mmuso mararo tlasa sehlooho se reng: “Le se ke la Siya Mang kapa Mang ka Morao”.
tgt_text: Izivumelwano ezityikityiweyo ngala mazwe mabini zineenjongo zokuqinisa ubudlelwano bezorhwebo, utyalo-mali, imfundo kunye nokusebenzisana kwimiba yezokhuselo.

src_text: Imbizo ne etelletswe pele ke ketelo ya Mopresidente sebakeng sa Ntlafatso ya Bodulo ba Batho Vlakkeland Catalytic haufi leng ntshetsopele ya matlo setjhaba kgolo ka ho fetisisa ho fihle jwale Masepaleng wa Lehae wa Drakenstein.
tgt_text: Imbizo kaMongameli yaseNtshona Koloni yeNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweziThili (i-DDM).

src_text: Ntlafatso tswetseng pele ka 2017 ha feela tla fana ka matlo 2 556 ho batho ba tshwanelehang..
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa ebebambe Imbizo kaMongameli yesithandathu ye-DDM eNtshona Koloni, kuMasipala weNgingqi wase-Drakenstein, kwiSithili sase-Cape Winelands, ngoLwesihlanu, umhla we-19 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Kaho ya matlo 942 Karolo ya Pele ntse tswela pele 454 se phethilwe mme 301 ntse hahwa.

Bohlokwa ba projeke ena ke hore haha mefuta fapaneng ya dikgetho tsa matlo ho tloha ho batho ba fumanang moputso wa R0 ho ya ho R3 500 (tlasa Ho Qetella Motheo Motjha), ho Lenaneo la Ditjhelete le Hokahaneng le Motho ka Mong, bakeng sa batho ba fumanang moputso pakeng tsa R3 501 le R22 000 ka selemo.
tgt_text: UMongameli ebekhokele igqiza lawo omathathu amaqoqo karhulumente phantsi komxholo othi: “Kungashiywa Namnye Ngasemva”.

src_text: Monyetla wa Bodulo ba Setjhaba hammoho le wa Bahlabani ba Sesole teng projekeng ena.
tgt_text: Le Mbizo ibanjwe emva kokuba uMongameli ebetyelele i-Vlakkeland Catalytic Human Settlement Development ekutshane phaya, elelona phulo likhulu likarhulumente lokwakhiwa kwezindlu oko wasekwayo lo Masipala weNgingqi wase-Drakenstein.

src_text: Ketelo ya Bolebedi ya Mmasepala wa Motsemoholo wa eThekwini le Mmasepala wa Setereke sa uMgungundlovu ka la 18 le la 19 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Lo msebenzi wokwakha waqaliswa ngowama-2017 xa ugqityiwe uza kwakha izindlu ezingama-2 556 eziza kufunyanwa ngabantu abafanelekileyo.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente Paul Mashatile ile buisana le batshehetsi ba amehang ho tsa thuto le thupello, temo, kgwebo le diindasteri nakong ya leeto la bookamedi Mmasepaleng wa Motsemoholo wa eThekwini le Mmasepaleng wa Setereke sa uMgungundlovu le karolo ya DDM ya ketelo ya bolebedi.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwezindlu ezingama-942 kwiSigaba sokuQala wona sele uqhuba, ezingama-454 zona sele zakhiwe zona ezingama-301 zisakhiwa.

src_text: Diprojeke tse ka sehloohong tse etetsweng ne le tsa sebaka sa Projeke ya Ntshongweni Catalytic, moo Smart City ntse ahwa pakeng tsa Durban le Pietermaritzburg.
tgt_text: Eli phulo libalulekile kuba lakha iintlobo zezindlu ezahlukeneyo ukusukela kwezo zabo bamkela umvuzo oyi-R0 ukuya kwabo bamkela i-R3 500 (phantsi komgaqo-nkqubo obizwa ngokuba yi-Breaking New Ground), ukuya kula nkqubo ibizwa ngokuba yi-Financed Linked Individual Subsidy Programme, yabo bamkela phakathi kwe-R3 501 ne-R22 000 ngonyaka.

src_text: Projeke ena tla tsosolosa mosebetsi wa moruo sebakeng seo tla ba le tlatsetso ya diranta tse dibilione tse ka bang 15 tsa letsete dilemo tse latelang tse 10 ho isa ho tse.
tgt_text: Le projekthi iza kwakha izindlu ezisiBonelelo sezeNtlalo kunye nezo zilungele amaGqala eeMfazwe.

src_text: Tsamaiso ya Phepelo ya Metsi.
tgt_text: UTyelelo lokuHlola oluya kuMasipala oMbaxa waseThekwini noweSithili saseMgungundlovu ngomhla we-18 no-19 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile etela Morero wa Metsi Dihlaba tsa Lesotho ka Labobedi la 23 Motsheanong 2023 leng moo ileng kenya letsoho moketeng wa ho fetola lekote la Mohato wa 2 wa projeke saennwe dilemong tse mmalwa tse fetileng mme ile wa dieha, mokete ona ke pontsho ya ho potlakisa mohato wa dinaha tsena tse pedi.
tgt_text: USekela-Mongameli u-Paul Mashatile ebebambe indibano yokufakana imilomo kunye namahlakani akwicandelo lezemfundo noqeqesho, ezolimo, ezorhwebo kunye nezoshishino ngethuba ekutyelelo lokuya kuhlola kuMasipala oMbaxa waseThekwini kunye noMasipala wesiThili saseMgungundlovu njengenxalenye yotyelelo lwe-DDM lokuya kuhlola.

src_text: Morero wa Metsi Dihlaba tsa Lesotho bohlokwa bakeng sa ho netefatsa polokeho ya phepelo ya metsi Gauteng, Foreistata, Mpumalanga, Leboya Bophirima le Kapa Bophirima.
tgt_text: Ezinye zeeprojekthi ezingundoqo yile yase-Ntshongweni Catalytic Project, apho kuza kwakhiwa isiXeko Sale Mihla phakathi kweTheku noMgungundlovu.

src_text: Letsete tsamaisong ya phepelo ya metsi bakeng sa ho ntlafatsa bophelo ba MaAfrika Borwa le ntse le tswela pele, ka phano ya diranta tse ka hodimo ho dibilione tse 14 ho bomasepala bakeng sa ho shebana le ditsamaiso tsa phepelo ya metsi tse saletseng morao, ka Thuso ya Infrastraktjha Kgolo ya Mabatowa Mangata (RBIG) le Thuso ya Infrastraktjha ya Ditshebeletso tsa Metsi (WSIG).
tgt_text: Le projekthi iza kuvuselela uqoqosho lwale ngingqi, ize izale namathuba otyalo-mali axabisa imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-15 kule minyaka ili-10 ukuya kweli-15 izayo.

src_text: RBIG tla sebediswa diprojekeng tse 130 mme WSIG yona abelwe diprojeke tse fetang 400 ho phatlalla le naha.
tgt_text: Iziseko ezingundoqo zamanzi.

src_text: Kabinete boetse thabisitswe ke hore Lefapha la Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS) le nka mehato ya ho lwantsha bobodu ka ho busetswa ha dimilione tse ka bang R600 ke dikhamphani tse unneng molemo ka ho fumana dithendara tse sa tlwaelehang.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa ebendwendwele i-Lesotho Highlinds Water Project ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-23 kuCanzibe 2023 ngethuba ethatha inxaxheba kumsitho wokuphethulwa kwesoyi wesiGaba 2 sale projekthi.

src_text: Kabinete boetse hokometse mehato ya taolo ya thibelo behilweng ke lefapha ho fedisa ditshenyehelo tse sa tlwaelehang, tse se nang ditholwana le tse se nang thuso.
tgt_text: Le projekthi yatyikitywa kule minyaka iliqela igqithileyo futhi nethe yalityaziswa zizinto ezininzi, lo msitho ubuluphawu olubonisa ukuqaliswa komsebenzi okhawulezileyo wale projekthi yamazwe amabini.

src_text: Kgau ya Tshireletso ya Setjhaba.
tgt_text: I-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ibaluleke kakhulu kumalinge okuqinisekisa ukuba kukho amanzi oneleyo e-Gauteng, Freyistatha, Mpumalanga, Mntla Ntshona naseMntla Koloni..

src_text: Afrika Borwa fumane Kgau ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba ya Tshireletso ya Setjhaba (ISSA) le Ditlwaelo tse Ntle ya maemo ho Tshireletso ya Setjhaba bakeng sa Afrika 2023 elang hloko letsete la mmuso bophelong ba bana ba rona, haholo ba tswang malapeng futsanehileng le nang le mathata.
tgt_text: Ukutyala imali kwiziseko ezingundoqo zamanzi ukwenzela ukuphucula iimpilo zabemi boMzantsi Afrika kuqhubelekile ngokuthi kwabelwe oomasipala imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-14 eza kusetyenziswa kwiziseko ezingundoqo zamanzi ezisanqongopheleyo, kusetyenziswa isibonelelo esibizwa ngokuba yi-Regional Bulk Infrastructure Grant (i-RBIG) kunye nesibizwa ngokuba yi-Water Services Infrastructure Grant (i-WSIG).

src_text: Tokelo ya ho kena ha Afrika Borwa bakeng sa kgau ena ya maemo ne na le sehlooho se reng: “Katoloso ya hanyane ka hanyane ya kakaretso ya tshireletso ho bana ba nang le mathata: Taba ya Krante ya Tlhokomelo ya Ngwana, Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: Isibonelelo se-RBIG siza kusetyenziswa kwiiprojekthi ezili-130 yona ke i-WSIG iza kusetyenziswa kwiiprojekthi ezingaphezulu kwama-400 kulo lonke eli lizwe.

src_text: Kakaretso ya dikenyeletso tse 138 ile ya fumanwa ho tswa ho ditho tse 48 tsa mekgatlo tswang dinaheng tse fetang 30 tse Afrika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba iSebe lezaManzi noGutyulo lisenza umsebenzi obonakalayo kwidabi lokulwa urhwaphilizo kuba imali emalunga nezigidi zeerandi ezingama-600 sele ibuyiselwe kwisebe isuka kwiinkampani ebezixhamle ngokutyikitya izivumelwano nesebe ezingekho mthethweni.

src_text: Thuso ya rona ya setjhaba ke motheo wa mmuso wa leano la ho fedisa tlala mme ka sehlohong bakeng sa ho kgutlisa seriti sa batho ba habo rona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivile nangamanyathelo aqulunqwe lisebe okuthintela urhwaphilizo kunye nokulwa inkcitho engekho mthethweni neyilahleko.

src_text: Tsamaiso ya tshireletso ya Afrika Borwa hara tse kgolo ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng, mme na le baamohedi ba fetang dimilione tse.
tgt_text: IMbasa yeziBonelelo zeNtlalo.

UMzantsi Afrika uphumele imbasa ephezulu ebizwa ngokuba yi-Good Practice Award in Social Security for Africa 2023 ye-International Social Security Association (i-ISSA) eqhwabela izandla imali etyalwe ngurhulumente kubomi babantwana bethu, ingakumbi abo baphuma kumakhaya asokolayo nangathathi ntweni.

src_text: Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ungenelele olu khuphiswano lwale mbasa phantsi kwesihloko esithi: “Ukwandiswa kancinci kwenani labantwana abasokolayo abaxhamla kwiinkonzo zentlalo: uPhando ngeMali-sibonelelo yaBantwana, eMzantsi Afrika”.

src_text: Kabinete thabisitswe ke hore Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete tsa mafapha mmuso di tswela pele hantle.
tgt_text: Abebengenelele olu khuphiswano bebeli-138 bebonke bephuma kwimibutho engamalungu engama-48 yona evela kumazwe angaphezulu kwama-30 ase-Afrika.

src_text: Sejule ya Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete tse latelang le tshehetso ya dipuisano tsa boraditaba:..
tgt_text: Izibonelelo zethu zezentlalo ziyinxalenye yenkqubo karhulumente yokulwa indlala kwaye zibaluleke kakhulu ekubuyiseleni abantu bakuthi izidima zabo.

src_text: Ka Labohlano la 26 Motsheanong 2023 ka 13:00, Letona la Tsamaiso ya Tshebedisano le Ditaba tsa Setso (CoGTA), Mofumahadi Thembi Nkadimeng tla tsamaisa puisano le boraditaba mabapi le Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete tsa CoGTA tla bontsha mehato reretsweng ho matlafatsa tshebetso ya bommasepala...
tgt_text: Inkqubo yezibonelelo-mali yoMzantsi Afrika iyenye yezona zinkulu kwihlabathi jikelele, kuba inabantu abaxhamla kuyo abangaphezulu kwizigidi ezili-.

src_text: Ka Labobedi la 30 Motsheanong 2023, Letona la Ntlafatso ya Setjhaba, Mofumahadi Lindiwe Zulu, le Letona la Toka le Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa, Monghadi Ronald Lamola, ba tla tshwara seboka sa Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete mme dintlha tsa puisano ya bona le boraditaba di tla fanwa ka nako loketseng..
tgt_text: IVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali.

src_text: Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete ya Mopresidente di tla tekwa ka Laboraro la 31 Motsheanong 2023, mme puisano le boraditaba mabapi le Kgatelopele ka Diphetoho tsa Moralo le Mehato ya Khiro ka kgokahano le Operation Vulindlela, di tla tshwarwa ka Labobedi la 30 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile zindaba zokuba iVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali zamasebe karhulumente ziqhuba kakuhle.

src_text: Sehopotso sa Dilemo tse 20 sa Letsatsi la Afrika le Tsela ya Tekolo ya Semphato ya Afrika (APRM).
tgt_text: Isicwangciso seeVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali ezisezayo kunye neentlanganiso noonondaba:..

src_text: Kabinete le maAfrika Borwa ohle ikopantse le kontinente ya Afrika le lefatshe lohle ho keteka Letsatsi la Afrika ka Labone la 25 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: NgoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2023 ngentsimbi ye-13:00, uMphathiswa woLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli (i-CoGTA), uNksz Thembi Nkadimeng, uza kubamba intlanganiso namajelo eendaba ngeVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali ye-CoGTA apho aza kucacisa ngamanyathelo aza kuthatyathwa okuphucula umsebenzi woomasipala..

src_text: Selemo sena se bohlokwa ka ho kgetheha kaha se tshwaya sehopotso sa bo-60 sa ho saenwa ha molao wa motheo wa Mokgatlo wa Kopano ya Afrika leng selelekela sa Kopano ya Afrika.
tgt_text: NgoLwesibini, umhla wama-30 kuCanzibe, uMphathiswa woPhuhliso loLuntu, uNksz Lindiwe Zulu kunye noMphathiswa wezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko, uMnu Ronald Lamola, baza kuqhuba iiVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali zamasebe wabo.

src_text: Mookotaba bakeng sa mekete ya 2023– “Ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Potlakiso ya Sebaka sa Kgwebo Lokolohileng Kontinenteng ya Afrika” – ho ela hloko mehato nkilweng bakeng sa ho kenya tshebetsong sebaka se seholo ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng sa tokoloho ya kgwebo.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha zeentlanganiso zabo namajelo eendaba ziza kukhutshwa kwalapha exesheni..

src_text: Sehopotso sa Kgwedi ya Afrika sa selemong sena se dumellanang le sehopotso sa bo-20 sa APRM, se reretswe ho sebedisa taolo ntle ka hara kontinente ka thuto ya papiso hlophisitsweng le boitekolo
tgt_text: IVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali ye-Ofisi kaMongameli iza kwenziwa ngoLwesithathu, umhla wama-31 kuCanzibe 2023 ize intlanganiso noonondaba engoTshintsho kwiNdlela Elimi Ngayo uQoqosho kunye namaPhulo oDalo-msebenzi aququzelelwa yi-Operation Vulindlela, ibanjwe ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-30 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: USuku lwe-Afrika kunye nesikhumbuzo seminyaka engama-20 yeNkqubo yokuHlolana kwaMazwe ase-Afrika (i-APRM).

src_text: Namakwa Special Economic Zone (SEZ).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi nabemi bonke boMzantsi Afrika baza kubhiyozela uSuku lwe-Afrika njengelizwekazi le-Afrika kunye nehlabathi, ngoLwesine, umhla wama-25 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana ho qollwa ha Namakwa SEZ Aggeneys, Kapa Leboya.
tgt_text: Lo nyaka ubaluleke nangakumbi kuba ngunyaka wama-60 wesikhumbuzo sokutyikitywa koxwebhu olwaseka uMbutho woManyano lwe-Afrika (i-OAU), yona eyazala uMbutho weMbumba ye- Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Tlhahiso ya ho qolla etswa tumellanong le Molao wa Dibaka tse Kgethehileng tsa Moruo wa 2014 (Molao 16 wa 2014) mme SEZ sisintsweng, ke karolo ya Tshebetso ya Matsete ya Mopresidente.
tgt_text: Umxholo wemibhiyozo yowama-2023 othi – “Ukukhawulezisa ukuqaliswa koMmandla weLizwekazi le-Afrika ongaHlawulisani iRhafu yoRhwebelwano” – wakhela kulo msebenzi mkhulu sele wenziwe wokuseka nokuqinisekisa ukuba uyenza lo mmandla unguwona mkhulu ungahlawulisani irhafu yorhwebelwano.

src_text: Namakwa SEZ tla ba senotlolo sa melemo ya morafo, tlhahiso ya hydrogen tala, ntlafatso ya infrastraktjha, eneji ka ntjhafatswang le tshebetso ya temo.
tgt_text: Imibhiyozo yeNyanga ye-Afrika yalo nyaka ibanjwe kanye ngeminyake engama-20 yesikhumbuzo se-APRM, eneenjongo zokuphucula iindlela zolawulo kweli lizwekazi ngokuthi amazwe alo afundisane aze ahlolane odwa

src_text: Mafapha bohlokwa bakeng sa tlhahiso ya mosebetsi le ntlafatso ya moruo wa Kapa Leboya le naha..
tgt_text: IziGqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Matsete fetang diranta tse dibilione tse 29 se ntse behetswe thoko bakeng sa mohato wa pele wa SEZ.
tgt_text: UMmandla oKhethekileyo wezoQoqosho (i-SEZ) wase-Namakwa.

src_text: Ona kenyeletsa boitlamo ho tswa ho Vedanta Zinc (Diranta tse dibilione tse 16), Frontier Rare Earth (Diranta tse dibilione tse 13), Hive Energy (Diranta tse dimilione tse 200) le RRS Trade and Investment (Diranta tse dimilione tse 100)..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukuthiywa ngokusesikweni kwe-Namakwa SEZ e-Aggeneys eMntla Koloni.

src_text: Kgatiso ya Boraro ya Leano la Mohlodi wa Metsi Setjhaba (NWRS-3).
tgt_text: Le ndawo iza kubizwa ngokuba yi-SEZ ngokoMthetho weMimandla eKhethekileyo yezoQoqosho, wowama-2014 (uMthetho uNombl 16 wowama-2014) futhi le SEZ icetywayo iyinxalenye yePhulo likaMongameli loTyalo-mali.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana NWRS-3 ya 2023, bakeng sa phethahatso, mme leano lena ke le tlamang ho bolaodi bohle le mekgatlo ho kenya tshebetsong Molao wa Naha wa Metsi wa 1998 (Molao 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: I-Namakwa SEZ iza kuvula amathuba kwicandelo lokuxhamlisa kwezemigodi, elokuveliswa kwehaydrojini engeyongozi kokusingqongileyo, uphuhliso lweziseko zophuhliso, amandla ahlaziyekayo kunye nokucolwa kuhlelwa iimveliso zolimo.

src_text: Leano lena le susumeditswe ke tlhahlobo ya dilemo tse tharo ya NWRS-2 qollotseng dibaka tsa katleho le dibaka tse ntseng di tobana le mathata..
tgt_text: La macandelo abaluleke kakhulu kumalinge okudala imisebenzi kunye nophuhliso loqoqosho lwaseMntla Koloni nolwelizwe.

src_text: NWRS-3 na le merero meraro ya sehlooho leng ntlafatso ya metsi le bohlweki lokelang ho tshehetswa, ho fediswa ha tlala le ho se lekalekane, tlatsetso moruong le tlhahiso ya mosebetsi, mme metsi lokela ho sireletswa, ho sebediswa, ho ntlafatswa, ho hlokomelwa le ho laolwa ka tsela tsitsitseng le ka ho lekana.
tgt_text: Imali yotyalo-mali engaphezulu kweebhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama-29 sele ibekelwe bucala ukuncedisa kwisigaba sokuqala sale SEZ.

src_text: Leano lena le etsa ditshisinyo tse tshwarehang bakeng sa ho eketsa phepelo ya metsi, ho fokotsa tlhokeho ya metsi, taolo atlehang ya metsi le bohlweki, ho laola lefapha la metsi le bohlweki, ho aba metsi bakeng sa phetoho, ho kgothaletsa tshebedisano ya matjhaba, le ho laola metsi le bohloweki tlasa maemo lehodimo ntseng fetoha..
tgt_text: Le mali iquka izithembiso ezazenziwe ngu-Vedanta Zinc (ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-16), ngu-Frontier Rare Earth (ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-13), Hive Energy (ezizigidi zeerandi ezingama-200) kunye no-RRS Trade and Investment (ezizigidi zeerandi ezili-100).

src_text: NWRS-3 phatlaladitswe websaeteng ya DWS ho www.dws.gov.za..
tgt_text: UPapasho lwesiThathu lwesiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe seMithombo yaManzi (i-NWRS-3) lowama-.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Mehato Kentsweng Tshebetsong ke Lefapha la Tshireletso (DoD) ho Sebetsana le Diketso le Boitshwaro ba Ditho tsa Sesole sa Naha sa Tshireletso sa Afrika Borwa (SANDF) tse Romelwang Mererong ya ho Boloka Kgotso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyivumile i-NWRS-3 yowama-2023 ukuba iqalise ukusetyenziswa kwaye esi sicwangciso-qhinga sibophelela onke amaziko namagosa anamagunya ukuba aqalise ukusebenzisa uMthetho waManzi eSizwe, wowe-1998 (uMthetho 36 wowe-1998).

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tlaleho mabapi le kgatelopele eo Afrika Borwa e etsang ho sebetsana le boitshwaro ba ditho tse ding tsa SANDF tse rometsweng bakeng sa ho boloka kgotso ho phatlalla le kontinente.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sisekelwe kuphononongo lweminyaka emithathu le-NWRS-2, oluthe lwabona iindawo eziqhube kakuhle kunye nezo kusekho ukuqhwalela kuzo.

src_text: SANDF se hlokometse mohlodi wa boikgantsho ba naha ha ntse kenya letsoho mererong ya ho boloka kgotso kontinenteng, bakeng sa tshireletso tsitsitseng le kgotso dinaheng tsa Afrika tse ruthuthilweng ke ntwa tse tlasa dithuso tsa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN)..
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 inemixholo engundoqo emithathu, owokuba kufuneka amanzi nogutyulo axhase uphuhliso, ukulwa indlala nokungalingani, ukufaka isandla kuqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi, nokuba amanzi kufuneka akhuselwe, asetyenziswe, aphuhliswe, aphathwe aze alawulwe ngendlela engazikuwatshabalalisa nelinganayo.

src_text: Ka diqoso tsa ditlolo tsa thobalano tse amang masole bolokang kgotso tse qadileng ho hlahella ka 2015, Sehlopha sa Tshebetso sa Matona se ile sa thehwa ka 2019 bakeng sa ho etsa dipatlisiso ka diqoso tsa tlhekefetso ya peto le tlhekefetso (SEA) ka hare ho DoD..
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga senza izindululo ezibambekayo zokuba kwandiswe umthamo wamanzi akhoyo, kuphungulwe isantya asetyenziswa ngaso, ukulawula ngokufanelekileyo kwamanzi nogutyulo, ukuqulunqa imithetho eza kulawula icandelo lezamanzi nogutyulo, ukutshintshwa kwendlela ankinkishwa ngayo kusenzelwa ukwenza iinguqu, ukukhuthaza intsebenziswano namazwe ehlabathi kunye nokukwazi ukulawula amanzi nogutyulo phantsi kwezi meko zokuguqu-guquka kwemozulu.

src_text: Kabinete kgotsofaditswe ke letoto la mehato kentsweng tshebetsong ya ho sebetsana le diketsahalo tsa SEA mererong ya ho boloka kgotso ya SANDF.
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 ipapashwe kule webhusayithi ye-DWS: www.dws.gov.za..

src_text: UN nka Afrika Borwa na le ditlwaelo tse ntle ka ho fetisisa mme thoholeditse naha ka kgatelopele eo e entseng ya ho hlakola SEA ka hare ho SANDF.
tgt_text: Ingxelo ngamanyathelo athatyathwe liSebe lezoKhuselo (i-DoD) ukulungisa ingxaki yokuziphatha kwamajoni oMkhosi wezoKhuselo weSizwe waseMzantsi Afrika (i-SANDF) atyalwe kumaphulo ogcino-xolo..

src_text: Kabinete hatisitse hore ditlwaelo tsa SEA di ke ke tsa dumellwa ho senya tlaleho ntle ya SANDF kontinenteng..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo malunga nomgama osele uhanjwe nguMzantsi Afrika ukulungisa ezi zingxaki zinxulumene nendlela aziphethe ngawo amanye amalungu e-SANDF atyalwe kumaphulo ogcino-xolo kweli lizwekazi lethu.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Batjha ya.
tgt_text: I-SANDF ibisinika iwonga nodumo sisisizwe ngokuthatha kwayo inxaxheba kumaphulo ogcino-xolo kweli lizwekazi ukuqinisekisa ukuba kukho uzinzo noxolo kumazwe ase-Afrika athwaxwa zimfazwe ikwenza oku iyinxalenye yeZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN).

src_text: Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Batjha la 2023 tlasa mookotaba: “Ho potlakisa tokoloho ya moruo wa batjha bakeng sa bokamoso ba moshwelella”.
tgt_text: Ukuvela ngowama-2015 kwezityholo zokuxhaphaza ngokwesondo ezibhekiswa kumajoni ayinxalenye yogcino-xolo kwakhokelela ekubeni kusekwe iKomiti yabaPhathiswa ngowama-2019 ukuze iphande izityholo zokuxhaphaza ngokwesondo nempathombi (i-SEA) kwi-DoD.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente Mashatile tla beha puo Letsatsing la Setjhaba leo selemong sena le tla ketekwa ka matsatsi mabedi ho tloha ka la 16 ho isa ho la 17 Phuptjane 2023, Setsing sa Dipapadi sa Mangaung, Bloemfontein, Foreistata.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumance kakhulu ngala manyathelo aza kuthatyathwa ukulwa ezi ngxaki zinxulumene ne-SEA kumaphulo ogcino-xolo e-SANDF.

src_text: Matsatsing ao mabedi, ho tla ba le monyetla wa hore batjha ba nke karolo puisanong le Matona, Batlatsi ba Matona le baamehi ba bang ho dithupello tse fapafapaneng, menyetla ya kgwebo le ntlafatso fumanehang ka hara mmuso le balekane ba setjhaba..
tgt_text: I-UN iyawuhlonipha uMzantsi Afrika njengelizwe eliziphatha ngendlela engenasiphako kwaye iliqhwabele izandla eli lizwe ngomsebenzi esele liwenzile wokusiphula neengcambu i-SEA kwi-SANDF.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Batjha tla thakgolwa ka Labone la 1 Phuptjane ke Letona la Kantoro ya Mopresidente wa Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba Nang le Boqhwala, ke Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma le Hector Pieterson Memorial le Musiamong wa Soweto..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikubethelele ukuba imikhutyana ye-SEA ayizikuvunyelwa ukuba ingcolise igama elihle le-SANDF kweli lizwekazi.

src_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho baahi hore ba matlafatse boiteko ba ho netefatsa hore batjha ba fumana menyetla tla ba dumella ho ba le seabo moruong.
tgt_text: INyanga yoLutsha yowama-.

src_text: Mmuso, jwaloka mohiri ya itlhommeng pele arabetse tlhokong ya ntlafatso ya bokgoni le khiro ya batjha ka ho dumella ho hirwa ha baithuti ba sa sebetseng hore ba fumane boiphihlelo ho Lenaneo la Boithuti la Tshebeletso ya Mmuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele iNkqubo yowama-2023 yeNyanga yoLutsha phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukukhawulezisa amaphulo okuxhobisa ulutsha ngezoqoqosho ukwenzela ikamva eliqaqambileyo”.

src_text: Mmuso boetse kentse tshebetsong Letlole la Khiro ya Setjhaba (SEF) mme wa tsosolosa boiteko ba tlhahiso ya mesebetsi ya Tshebeletso ya Naha ya Batjha (NYS) hulelang dikete tsa batjha ho tsa moruo.
tgt_text: USekela-Mongameli uMashatile uza kwenza intetho ngoSuku lweSizwe kulo nyaka oluza kuqhuba iintsuku ezimbini ukususela ngomhla we-16 ukuya kowe-17 kweyeSilimela 2023 e-Mangaung Outdoor Sport Centre, e-Mangaung, e-Bloemfontein, eFreyistatha.

src_text: Kenello ya Mopresidente Khirong ya Batjha se ntse atlehile ho tshehetsa ho fumaneha ha menyetla dimilione tse.
tgt_text: Eza ntsuku zimbini ziza kunika ulutsha ithuba lokuthatha inxaxheba kwiingxoxo kunye nabaPhathiswa, amaSekela abaPhathiswa kunye namanye amahlakani ezimalunga namathuba amaninzi akhoyo ezoqoqosho, ushishino nophuhliso kurhulumente nakumahlakani ezentlalo.

src_text: 5 ya meputso ya nakwana, milione le nngwe ya dibaka tse thehilweng mosebetsing, menyetla 250 000 ya thuto kopantseng mosebetsi, menyetla 250 000 ya ditshebeletso tse lefang mme batjha ba 500 000 ba tshwarehile ka mesebetsi fanang ka moputso.
tgt_text: INyanga yoLutsha iza kuphehlelelwa ngokusesikweni ngoLwesine, umhla woku-1 kweyeSilimela nguMphathiswa okwi-Ofisi kaMongameli wezamaNina, uLutsha kunye naBantu abaKhubazekileyo, uGq Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma e-Hector Pieterson Memorial and Museum e-Soweto.

src_text: Ha ntse re kena Kgweding ya Batjha, mmuso hopotsa batjha ho ingodisa ho SAYouth.mobi kaha batjha ba bang ba dimilione tse nne ba se ba ntse ba ingodisitse, moo menyetla ya mosebetsi ka fihlellwang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi icele isizwe ukuba siwaqinise amalinge okuqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha bayawafumana amathuba aza kubanceda ukuba bakwazi ukudlala indima ebonakalayo kuqoqosho.

src_text: Seboka se Kopanetsweng sa Foramo Bakeng sa Patlisiso ya Seboka sa bo-8 sa Afrika (FARA) sa Kgwebo ya Temo Afrika le Beke ya Saense hammoho le Seboka sa sona sa Kakaretso sa bo-.
tgt_text: Urhulumente, njengolona qumrhu liqeshe abona bantu baninzi, uthathe amanyathelo afanelekileyo okusabela kumba wokufuneka kophuhliso lwezakhono kunye nokuqeshwa kolutsha ngokuvumela abo banezidanga bangasebenziyo ukuba bafumane amava omsebenzi ngokusebenzisa i-Public Service Graduate Internship and Leadership Programme.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse hore Afrika Borwa be motsamaisi mmoho wa Seboka sa FARA sa bo-8 sa Kgwebo ya Temo le Beke ya Saense Afrika hammoho le Seboka sa sona sa Kakaretso sa bo-9 Durban ho tloha ka la 5 ho ya ho la 9 Phuptjane..
tgt_text: Urhulumente uqalise amaphulo okudala imisebenzi aquka i-Social Employment Fund waze wavuselela ne-National Youth Service (i-NYS) enika amawaka abantu abatsha amathuba okuba bakwazi ukuthatha inxaxheba kuqoqosho.

src_text: FARA ke mokgatlo hlophisitsweng wa dikontinente ikarabellang ka ho thusa le ho hokahanya patlisiso ya temo le kgatelopele ya boqapi kontinenteng..

src_text: The draft Bill aims to amend the National Small Enterprise Act (Act 102 of 1996) and provides for the establishment and registration of the Office of Small Enterprise Ombud Service.

src_text: It broadens fair processes for small enterprises through the Ombud Service, which will be tasked with considering and disposing of complaints by small enterprises.
